title: My Interview with Josh Brown on The Compound - Ep 82
itunes:title: My Interview with Josh Brown on The Compound - Ep 82
description:
Vitaliy had the pleasure to sit down with the Reformed Broker himself, Josh Brown on his podcast The Compound. What follows is their conversation, in which they discuss why the price you pay for a stock always matters, no matter how good the quality, and then they go through some historical examples. Vitaliy hopes you enjoy it!

You can view this interview online here-> https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pcqeUmTq2IY&t=229s

You can read article "Nifty FAANG and Other "One Decision" Investment Strategies" in this link: https://contrarianedge.com/nifty-faang-and-other-one-decision-investment-strategies/ or listen to episode #78.

Disclosure: Read this before you buy your next stock
